mapper.insert: insert into animal(animal_no, animal_type, animal_name, animal_gender, animal_age, animal_inocul, animal_neuter, member_no, animal_admission) values(animal_seq.nextval,#{animalType},#{animalName},#{animalGender},#{animalAge},#{animalInocul},#{animalNeuter},#{memberNo},'N')
mapper.select: select animal_no from(select animal_no from animal where member_no = #{memberNo} order by animal_no desc) where rownum = 1
